bug.author: ForrestTrepte
bug.summary: Basic-Guide.md refers to 3DBallLearning and Model that don't exist
bug.description: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Unity-Technologies/ml-agents/blob/master/docs/Basic-Guide.md>Basic-Guide.md</denchmark-link> says However, under <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Unity-Technologies/ml-agents/tree/master/UnitySDK/Assets/ML-Agents/Examples/3DBall/TFModels>3DBall/TFModels</denchmark-link> I only see 3DBall.nn and 3DBallHard.nn with no 3DBallLearning.nn. Also, this refers to a Model property under the Ball 3D Agent (Script) component, but I don't see a Model property there in the inspector. Is the documentation out of date regarding this step?

comments.comment: Thanks for catching this. We updated the relevant documentation.
